Job Description


	Palmpay is looking for a customer service representative to join our team in our Abuja Office.

	The ideal candidate has a customer-first mindset and aims to deliver high-quality service in every customer interaction.


Responsibilities
The Contractor shall work as an Agent Support Officer to carry out the following responsibilities:


	Retrieval of POS terminals for walk-in agents
	Facilitate coin redemption transactions for walk-in agents, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies
	Coordinate the retrieval and replacement of faulty terminals for walk-in agents, ensuring minimal disruption to agent operations
	Identify and report trends and recurring issues to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction
	Maintain accurate records of coin transactions and reconcile discrepancies as needed
	Address inquiries and concerns from walk-in agents regarding POS terminals and coin redemption services
	Provide technical assistance and guidance to agents to optimize their use of POS terminals
	Generate reports on repair activities, coin transactions, and agent support services as required
	Other assigned related duties by the Line Manager.

Customer Service Representative Job at PalmPay




        
    

        
        PalmPay is an Africa-focused fintech firm, launched in 2019. PalmPay is a mobile payments platform that offers a number of financial services.

We are recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Abuja

Job Description
     

            
    




	Palmpay is looking for a customer service representative to join our team in our Abuja Office.
	This person will drive customer satisfaction by fielding inquiries, addressing pain points, and maintaining extensive product knowledge.
	The ideal candidate has a customer-first mindset and aims to deliver high-quality service in every customer interaction.


Responsibilities
The Contractor shall work as an Agent Support Officer to carry out the following responsibilities:


	Retrieval of POS terminals for walk-in agents
	Facilitate coin redemption transactions for walk-in agents, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies
	Coordinate the retrieval and replacement of faulty terminals for walk-in agents, ensuring minimal disruption to agent operations
	Identify and report trends and recurring issues to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction
	Maintain accurate records of coin transactions and reconcile discrepancies as needed
	Address inquiries and concerns from walk-in agents regarding POS terminals and coin redemption services
	Provide technical assistance and guidance to agents to optimize their use of POS terminals
	Generate reports on repair activities, coin transactions, and agent support services as required
	Other assigned related duties by the Line Manager.

	Must be able to work without supervision
	Must be computer literate.
	Reputation management.
	Must be a highly motivated, creative individual with experience and a passion for connecting with current and future customers.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: houseofmaryjane1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We invest in industries like travel, manufacturing, farming, and mining — all focused on building a strong and lasting economy.

Because our funding comes from the Diaspora, we have two teams working closely together: a leadership group in the U.S. that drives innovation and mobilizes capital, and a hands-on team in Nigeria that runs daily operations. This teamwork helps us stay connected to local needs while using global best practices to deliver real results.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) & Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the role


	We are seeking a proactive Executive Assistant to keep our leadership team focused, organized, and moving forward.
	This isn’t your average assistant role; you will be managing projects, streamlining communication, juggling calendars, and making sure nothing falls through the cracks.
	We need someone who thrives on structure, loves working with project management tools like Notion and Trello, and isn’t afraid to suggest better ways of doing things.
	You'll work closely with our leadership team Monday through Friday, helping us stay accountable to our goals, deadlines, and commitments, while occasionally pitching in on our social media and marketing efforts.
	If you love solving problems, keeping things on track, and adding a touch of creativity to your day, this might just be the perfect fit.


What you will be doing


	Manage executive calendars, coordinate meetings, and ensure follow-ups don’t slip through the cracks
	Own and maintain project management systems like Notion, Trello, or Asana, making sure timelines and deliverables are met
	Research tools, systems, and solutions to improve workflows and overall team efficiency
	Provide basic support for social media scheduling and content coordination
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to move initiatives forward and track progress
	Draft and manage internal communications, including weekly updates and project briefs
	Support light marketing tasks such as proofreading, formatting creative assets, and uploading content
	Organize digital files, notes, and assets using platforms like Google Drive, Dropbox, or Notion


What we are looking for


	3+ years of experience in an executive assistant, project coordinator, or operations support role
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Experience using project management tools (Notion, Trello, Asana, Monday.com, etc.)
	Highly organized with a natural ability to manage multiple deadlines and moving parts
	Tech-savvy—comfortable picking up new tools and platforms quickly
	Able to work independently, anticipate needs, and offer solutions without being asked
	Familiarity with social media platforms and marketing tools like Canva, Buffer, or Mailchimp (preferred)
	Marketing, communications, or content creation experience (preferred)
